1.text: Shuffle the deck of cards before starting the game.

2.text: Divide the cards evenly between all the players.

3.text: Hold your own cards face-up in a stack so only the top 1 is visible.

4.text: Wait for the player left of the dealer to choose a card and read 1 of the stats.

5.text: Invite other players to compare the same stat on their card.

6.text: Collect all of the players’ cards if your stat is highest.

7.text: Start a new round with the winning player calling out a stat.

8.text: Place everyone’s cards in the middle if there’s a tie.

9.text: Play multiple rounds until 1 player has all the cards.
